attributes.action: Establish the House of Lords as a fully elected second chamber of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: House of Lords reform has been piecemeal and remains unresolved. While the primacy of the Commons in the legislative process should not be reduced, a fully elected second chamber would give greater integrity to the entire political process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
